name: Petulant Penguin presents... Autoheart + Mano's Daughter
description:
IMPORTANT: E-TICKETS WILL NO LONGER BE SENT OUT FOR ORDERS AFTER 2:30pm ON FRIDAY 6th DEC. YOU WILL HAVE YOUR NAMES ADDED TO THE TICKET LIST ON THE DOOR.

Date: 6th December 2013
Time: 7:30pm
Venue: Cargo, Shoreditch
Line-up: Autoheart + Mano's Daughter
Tickets: £6 Advance. £8 on the door. Includes entry to Cargo Club Night (normally £15)

Autoheart released their much anticipated debut album 'Punch' in mid July. Produced by Danton Supple (Coldplay and Morrissey), the band have received rave reviews. From the ridiculously catchy 'Moscow' to the brilliantly sparse 'Agoraphobia'. Make sure you see them live.... at Cargo!

Autoheart will be joined by the superb 'Mano's Daughter'. Dark synth pop trio that draws you in. If you haven't heard them yet, check them out at http://www.manosdaughter.co.uk/

T&C's: Tickets are non-refundable or Transferable
